scripts.start: npm install && npm install react react-dom react-router-dom redux react-redux && npm install redux-persist && npm install @reduxjs/toolkit && npm install uuid && npm install @fortawesome/react-fontawesome @fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons && react-scripts start
scripts.build: npm install && npm install react react-dom react-router-dom redux react-redux && npm install redux-persist && npm install @reduxjs/toolkit && npm install uuid && npm install @fortawesome/react-fontawesome @fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons && react-scripts build
